kv10.6:1.3_0: Maggasamaṅgī dvīhi phassehi dvīhi vedanāhi dvīhi saññāhi dvīhi cetanāhi dvīhi cittehi dvīhi saddhāhi dvīhi vīriyehi dvīhi satīhi dvīhi samādhīhi dvīhi paññāhi samannāgatoti?
kv10.6:2.3_0: Maggasamaṅgī lokiyena phassena lokiyāya vedanāya lokiyāya paññāya lokiyāya cetanāya lokiyena cittena lokiyāya saddhāya lokiyena vīriyena lokiyāya satiyā lokiyena samādhinā lokiyāya paññāya samannāgatoti?
kv10.6:3.1_0: Maggasamaṅgī lokiyena ca lokuttarena ca sīlena samannāgatoti?
kv10.6:3.3_0: Maggasamaṅgī lokiyena ca lokuttarena ca phassena samannāgato …pe…
kv10.6:3.4_0: lokiyāya ca lokuttarāya ca paññāya samannāgatoti?
kv10.6:5.1_0: Maggasamaṅgī lokiyāya ca lokuttarāya ca sammāvācāya samannāgatoti?
kv10.6:5.3_0: Maggasamaṅgī lokiyāya ca lokuttarāya ca sammādiṭṭhiyā samannāgatoti?
kv10.6:5.5_0: maggasamaṅgī lokiyāya ca lokuttarāya ca sammāvācāya samannāgatoti?
kv10.6:5.7_0: Maggasamaṅgī lokiyena ca lokuttarena ca sammāsaṅkappena …pe…
kv10.6:5.10_0: lokiyena ca lokuttarena ca sammāsamādhinā samannāgatoti?
kv10.6:6.1_0: Maggasamaṅgī lokiyena ca lokuttarena ca sammākammantena …pe…
kv10.6:6.4_0: Maggasamaṅgī lokiyāya ca lokuttarāya ca sammādiṭṭhiyā samannāgatoti?
kv10.6:6.6_0: maggasamaṅgī lokiyena ca lokuttarena ca sammāājīvena samannāgatoti?
kv10.6:6.8_0: Maggasamaṅgī lokiyena ca lokuttarena ca sammāsaṅkappena …pe…
kv10.6:6.9_0: lokiyena ca lokuttarena ca sammāsamādhinā samannāgatoti?
kv10.6:7.8_0: tena hi maggasamaṅgī dvīhi sīlehi samannāgatoti.
